page.title: 05MORDIFORD AREA HOUSING
page.content: 70 % of all housing in the Mordiford/ Dormington area, is council owned. Most of these properties date from about 1930 _ 1960. Being council owned,it is difficult to evaluate them;and thus makes it impossible to work out a meaningful average price of residential property in the area. This is largely because much of the remaining housing consists mainly of farm_steads and other largish rural property (dating from 1500 _ 1850 approx). Since 1900 the only "major" development in the D-Block has been the construction of a small estate of "3 bedroom sized" council houses. Apart from this "Sufton Rise" estate there seems to have been little or no development in recent years.
